author: Andrew Nomura
title: chevron-right
text: {p}HEADLINE: Few showers late Saturday{/p}{p}LOW TODAY: 44{ } { } { } NORMAL LOW: 39{/p}{p}HIGH TODAY: 64{ } { } NORMAL HIGH: 56{/p}{p}We continue to be in a rinse and repeat forecast as the valley climbed into the 60s for the 20th time this December.{/p}{p}Scattered clouds will continue to move in overnight keeping temperatures on the mild side for this time of with a forecast low of 44degrees.{/p}{p}A weak area of low pressure will bring a few light showers across southern Nevada late Saturday with the highest chances for free water expected north and west of the valley.{/p}{p}A feet.{/p}{p}This system will quickly exit on New Year's Eve Day with temperatures arriving in time for the New Year.{/p}{p}Highs skies.{/p}{p}A so stay tuned!{/p}{p}CURRENT SNOWPACK: UPPER COLORADO RIVER BASIN - 72% (113% last year at this time){/p}{p}LAKE MEAD TRACKER: Lake mead is currently at 1067 feet compared to 1043 feet one year ago today.{/p}{p}Total valley rainfall in 2023: 4.59\" (+0.47\" above normal){/p}{p}Total valley rainfall through December 29th, 2022: 2.13\" (-1.92\" below normal){/p}{p}AIR QUALITY - HEALTHY{/p}{p}POLLEN COUNT:{/p}{p}TREES: NONE{/p}{p}MOLD: LOW{/p}{p}GRASS: NONE{/p}{p}WEEDS: LOW{/p}{p}- Bill Bellis{/p}{p}{ } Proof of concept AI assistant.{/p}{p}Las Vegas authorities and first responders are expected to have a robust presence at this year's New Year's Eve celebration.{/p}{p}More than 400,000 people are expected to ring in the new year in Las Vegas. At a media briefing Thursday, Las Vegas Metro Undersheriff Andrew Walsh would not specify how many officers would be out patrolling during \"America's Party\" but said very few officers will have the day off.{/p}{p}{sd-embed class=\"sd-embedded-media\" data-embed-file=\"1740434129269997892\" data-embed-type=\"twitter\" contenteditable=\"false\"}{/sd-embed}{/p}{p}{strong}MORE ON NEWS 3 |{a href=\"https://news3lv.com/news/local/things-to-do-new-years-happenings-in-las-vegas-strip-nine-casinos-fireworks-fontainebleau-hotel-downtown-plaza-topgolf-post-malone-bruno-mars#\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"https://news3lv.com/news/local/things-to-do-new-years-happenings-in-las-vegas-strip-nine-casinos-fireworks-fontainebleau-hotel-downtown-plaza-topgolf-post-malone-bruno-mars#\"}{ }{/a}{/strong}{a href=\"https://news3lv.com/news/local/things-to-do-new-years-happenings-in-las-vegas-strip-nine-casinos-fireworks-fontainebleau-hotel-downtown-plaza-topgolf-post-malone-bruno-mars#\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"https://news3lv.com/news/local/things-to-do-new-years-happenings-in-las-vegas-strip-nine-casinos-fireworks-fontainebleau-hotel-downtown-plaza-topgolf-post-malone-bruno-mars#\"}{strong}Things to do: New Year's happenings in Las Vegas{/strong}{/a}{/p}{p}Road closures are expected to start as early as 4:30 pm Sunday. 3,000 crowd control barricades will also be in place.{/p}{p}Officers will not only be cracking down on drunk and drugged drivers, but also enforcing items that are not allowed. This includes backpacks, scrollers, coolers, and glass bottles.{/p}{p}{sd-embed class=\"sd-embedded-media\" data-alt=\"KSNV\" data-caption=\"KSNV\" data-duration=\"200.192\" data-embed-type=\"video\" contenteditable=\"false\"}{/sd-embed}{/p}{p}Firefighters will also have a huge footprint as bomb squad and hazmat teams will be mobilized.{br}{/p}{p}Preparations for New Year's celebrations come weeks after the FBI and DHS sent memos to agencies across the country warning of lone-wolf attacks amid the war in the Middle East. Even though there are no credible threats, Las Vegas Metro is not taking any chances.{/p}{p}\"The threat is as real as it's ever been,\" said Walsh. \"We are doing everything to make sure everyone is safe.\"{/p}{p}Interstate 15 off-ramps at Flamingo will close at 5:30 p.m. Road closures on Las Vegas Boulevard from Spring Mountain Road to Tropicana Avenue will begin at 6:30 p.m., and the Strip will be shut down to all vehicle traffic by 8 p.m.{/p}{p}{sd-embed class=\"sd-embedded-media\" data-embed-file=\"1740909841697145103\" data-embed-type=\"twitter\" contenteditable=\"false\"}{/sd-embed}{/p}{p}Anyone under 18 without a parent is prohibited on the Strip and Downtown while a curfew is in place.{br}{/p}{p}HEADLINE: Few showers late Saturday{/p}{p}LOW TODAY: 44{ } { } { } NORMAL LOW: 39{/p}{p}HIGH TODAY: 64{ } { } NORMAL HIGH: 56{/p}{p}We continue to be in a rinse and repeat forecast as the valley climbed into the 60s for the 20th time this December.{/p}{p}Scattered clouds will continue to move in overnight keeping temperatures on the mild side for this time of with a forecast low of 44degrees.{/p}{p}A weak area of low pressure will bring a few light showers across southern Nevada late Saturday with the highest chances for free water expected north and west of the valley.{/p}{p}A feet.{/p}{p}This system will quickly exit on New Year's Eve Day with temperatures arriving in time for the New Year.{/p}{p}Highs skies.{/p}{p}A so stay tuned!{/p}{p}CURRENT SNOWPACK: UPPER COLORADO RIVER BASIN - 72% (113% last year at this time){/p}{p}LAKE MEAD TRACKER: Lake mead is currently at 1067 feet compared to 1043 feet one year ago today.{/p}{p}Total valley rainfall in 2023: 4.59\" (+0.47\" above normal){/p}{p}Total valley rainfall through December 29th, 2022: 2.13\" (-1.92\" below normal){/p}{p}AIR QUALITY - At a media briefing Thursday, Las Vegas Metro Undersheriff Andrew Walsh would not specify how many officers would be out patrolling during \"America's Party\" but said very few officers will have the day off.{/p}{p}{sd-embed class=\"sd-embedded-media\" data-embed-file=\"1740434129269997892\" data-embed-type=\"twitter\" contenteditable=\"false\"}{/sd-embed}{/p}{p}{strong}MORE ON NEWS 3 |{a href=\"https://news3lv.com/news/local/things-to-do-new-years-happenings-in-las-vegas-strip-nine-casinos-fireworks-fontainebleau-hotel-downtown-plaza-topgolf-post-malone-bruno-mars#\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"https://news3lv.com/news/local/things-to-do-new-years-happenings-in-las-vegas-strip-nine-casinos-fireworks-fontainebleau-hotel-downtown-plaza-topgolf-post-malone-bruno-mars#\"}{ }{/a}{/strong}{a href=\"https://news3lv.com/news/local/things-to-do-new-years-happenings-in-las-vegas-strip-nine-casinos-fireworks-fontainebleau-hotel-downtown-plaza-topgolf-post-malone-bruno-mars#\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"https://news3lv.com/news/local/things-to-do-new-years-happenings-in-las-vegas-strip-nine-casinos-fireworks-fontainebleau-hotel-downtown-plaza-topgolf-post-malone-bruno-mars#\"}{strong}Things to do: New Year's happenings in Las Vegas{/strong}{/a}{/p}{p}Road closures are expected to start as early as 4:30 pm Sunday. 3,000 crowd control barricades will also be in place.{/p}{p}Officers will not only be cracking down on drunk and drugged drivers, but also enforcing items that are not allowed. data-embed-type=\"video\" contenteditable=\"false\"}{/sd-embed}{/p}{p}Firefighters will also have a huge footprint as bomb squad and hazmat teams will be mobilized.{br}{/p}{p}Preparations for New Year's celebrations come weeks after the FBI and DHS sent memos to agencies across the country warning of lone-wolf attacks amid the war in the Middle East. Even though there are no credible threats, Las Vegas Metro is not taking any chances.{/p}{p}\"The threat is as real as it's ever been,\" said Walsh. \"We are doing everything to make sure everyone is safe.\"{/p}{p}Interstate 15 off-ramps at Flamingo will close at 5:30 p.m. Road closures on Las Vegas Boulevard from Spring Mountain Road to Tropicana Avenue will begin at 6:30 p.m., and the Strip will be shut down to all vehicle traffic by 8 p.m.{/p}{p}{sd-embed class=\"sd-embedded-media\" data-embed-file=\"1740909841697145103\" data-embed-type=\"twitter\" contenteditable=\"false\"}{/sd-embed}{/p}{p}Anyone under 18 without a parent is prohibited on the Strip and Downtown while a curfew is in place.{br}{/p}
